attributes.action: Pensioners,join the St Pauls protesters virtually by signing
attributes.additional_details:
Old people get really knocked about metaphorically as well as physically it seems, in the UK.
By supporting the aims of the St Paul's protesters you are supporting social justice.
Government and politicians are bone idle lazy and their biggest excuse is 'Self Regulation'. It does not work, it will never work, care homes were just as bad 35 years ago, banks have done the best they can to rob us all, pensioners in particular.
I cant do anything about it but Government can take  responsibility for ensuring social justice. What is their job anyway?
